text: Gastrochilus, abbreviated Gchls in horticultural trade, is a genus of plant in family Orchidaceae. It is native to eastern and southeastern Asia, including China, Japan, Bangladesh, Thailand, Malaysia, Indonesia, the Philippines, etc.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant FamiliesFlora of China, v 25 p 491, 盆距兰属 pen ju lan shu, Gastrochilus D.
